import React, { useState } from 'react' import { Form, Button } from 'react-bootstrap' import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux' import FormContainer from '../components/FormContainer' import {saveShippingAddress} from '../ac' const ShippingScreen = ({ history }) => { const cart = useSelector(state =>state.cart) const {shippingAddress} = cart const [address, setAddress] = useState('shippingAddress.address') const [city, setCity] = useState('shippingAddress.city') const [postalCode, setPostalCode] = useState('shippingAddress.postalCode') const [country, setCountry] = useState('shippingAddress.country') const submitHandler = (e)=>{ e.preventDefault(); console.log('submit') } return (

Shipping

Address setAddress(e.target.value)} > city setCity(e.target.value)} > Postal Code setPostalCode(e.target.value)} > Country setCountry(e.target.value)} >
) } export default ShippingScreen
